item.title: Coding Assistant Instructions for Learning
item.description:
When the journey matters more than the destination

Coding agents like Claude Code are cool, but it’s no fun if you want to learn to write code yourself.

If youâ€™re using coding agents but still want to learn, this pattern may help. Below is a set of instructions I include in the agent config file (CLAUDE.md for Claude Code) to help it help me learn functional programming in my personal projects. The principles are sourced from the book Mastering JavaScript Functional Programming by Federico Kereki. I used AI to refine them to be Python-specific for a project I’m working on.

item.title: New site, first post
item.description:
Quick introduction

My name is Roger.

I’m a developer relations engineer at Google, specifically Google Cloud.

What even is developer relations? Depends who you ask.

If you ask me, the job of a developer relations engineer is to be the liason between a technical product, platform or service, and the community of developers who use it. We help the developer find success with the platform, and help the platform improve for the developer. I’ll leave it at that for now.
